meanings.definition: Scatter or spread (things) untidily over a surface or area.
meanings.sent1: She bestrewn the flowers across the table.
meanings.sent2: The leaves were bestrewn all over the yard after the storm.
meanings.sent3: The toddler bestrewn his toys everywhere, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: The stars bestrewn the night sky like diamonds on velvet.
meanings.sent5: The confetti bestrewn at the party made the floor look festive.

meanings.sent1: The path was bestrewn with fallen leaves.
meanings.sent2: The beach was bestrewn with seashells of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome had a bestrewn hat full of tiny flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was bestrewn with glitter for the costume party.
meanings.sent5: The room was bestrewn with colorful balloons for the celebration.
